name: mri_tessellate
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: This program creates a surface by tessellating a given input volume.

inputs.description: Input volume (e.g., a filled MRI image).
inputs.name: Input volume

inputs.description: Label value for the tessellation. Integer value, if input is filled volume, 127 is rh, 255 is lh.
inputs.name: Label value

inputs.description: Binary surface of the tessellation, output file.
inputs.name: Output surface

inputs.description: Tessellate the surface of all voxels with different labels.
inputs.name: Different labels flag

inputs.description: Set the max number of vertices to nvertices, and the max number of faces to (2 * nvertices).
inputs.name: Max vertices

inputs.description: Save surface with real RAS coordinates where c_(r,a,s) != 0.
inputs.name: Real RAS flag

output-files.description: Output file of the tessellation surface, typically ?h.orig.
output-files.name: Output surface file
